channel.title: Week 01: Yellow Lines on 2021 Design Refresh

item.title: It Spins
item.description: The above is an MP4 video link. Please click it to view the video! Week 1: Yellow Lines. This art was lovingly created using: 3D Digital. Artist’s Notes 3 hoops that are spinning on the X, Y and Z axis respectfully Social Media Twitch: magus_hellwalker Other Edit this page on GitHub . Create a bug ticket for the developer. Parsed source from Discord is as follows: Week: 1 (I know I'm late) Title: It Spins Medium: 3D Digital Description: 3 hoops that are spinning on the X, Y and Z axis respectfully

item.title: Luminated Darkness
item.description: Week 1: Yellow Lines. This art was lovingly created using: Procreate. Artist’s Notes So I finally finished my week 1 prompt. Full time momma here. But wanted to share even tho I‚Äôm late ! pretty much the darkness symbolizes my emotions how they tend to take over. The sun here is shining light and making me see the positive things in life. Twitch:MoonlitNarcy Social Media Instagram: moonlit_narcy Twitter: moonlit_narcy Other Edit this page on GitHub .

item.title: Four of Pumpkins
item.description: Week 1: Yellow Lines. This art was lovingly created using: procreate. Artist’s Notes I wanted to do something elegant with pattern. However, when I streamed this like an hour ago, I was aggressively persuaded (bullied) into adding more pumpkins, and now it‚Äôs a tarot card of the suit of pumpkins. ü§∑üèª‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è Social Media Twitch: pumpkanart Twitter: pumpkanart Other Edit this page on GitHub . Create a bug ticket for the developer.

item.title: sunny day, pouring rain
item.description: Week 1: Yellow Lines. This art was lovingly created using: Digital, Photoshop. Artist’s Notes I wanted to try play with the rain patterns but rushed them a little. References are godsend. I was going for a minimal editorial look and limited pallette because those are outside of my comfort zone. Social Media Instagram: jrchlp.png Twitter: jorchaelp Other Edit this page on GitHub . Create a bug ticket for the developer.

item.title: Plaid & Lace sans Lace
item.description: Week 1: Yellow Lines. This art was lovingly created using: Ink, watercolour. Artist’s Notes Was originally going for “Plaid & Lace” as my keywords, but … no way I’m putting down work on the “Lace” part as well. The yellow is “Gold Star” ink from Diamine, the rest is fineliner, uni-ball for white and some cobalt+ultramarine for shaded areas. Social Media Instagram: arancil Twitch: arancil Twitter: arancil Other Edit this page on GitHub .

item.title: Rat 1 and Rat 2
item.description: Week 1: Yellow Lines. This art was lovingly created using: Digital, Paint Tool SAI. Artist’s Notes gay rat wedding I went a bit crazy on SAI which is a huge guilty pleasure. In the end it’s a bit cute and a good mood so I’m happy with what I made. Looking forward definitely going to use more references since i should, this is a bit surreal. @fiveclawd

item.title: upon sunflowers
item.description: Week 1: Yellow Lines. This art was lovingly created using: digital, procreate. Artist’s Notes going for simple w line work + pantone yellow. i also really love sunflowers. like a lot. an accompanying haiku: like the sunflowers / i look towards the sunlight / to moving forwards / Social Media Instagram: charmandaar_ Twitch: charmandaar Twitter: charmandaar_ Other Edit this page on GitHub .

item.title: Honey, I'm Home!
item.description: Week 1: Yellow Lines. This art was lovingly created using: FireAlpaca. Artist’s Notes I wanted to draw my oc in a dress, so I drew him in a dress! He likes wearing dresses from time to time. The sketchy plants in the bg are mostly to fill the space, but I thought they would look nice :) Social Media Tumblr: bellbones1207 Twitter: bbart1207 Other Edit this page on GitHub .

item.title: Just a Peep
item.description: Week 1: Yellow Lines. This art was lovingly created using: FireAlpaca64. Artist’s Notes I thought for a second, I didn’t know what to do though I knew I wanted to use my OC. It sorta just flowed and this was the outcome. I kinda like it though sorta don’t lol. Social Media Instagram: _daniluvsyou Other Edit this page on GitHub . Create a bug ticket for the developer.

item.title: New Year's Compass
item.description: Week 1: Yellow Lines. This art was lovingly created using: Digital (Clip Studio Paint). Artist’s Notes An eight point radial design in the style of a compass rose. Lines are all in the Pantone Yellow, while the background is two shades of blue: classic blue (2020’s Pantone color of the year) inside the design and a darker contrasted blue outside of it. IG/Tumblr @Lithiumreflections Social Media Instagram: lithiumreflections Tumblr: lithiumreflections Twitter: jaimeskelton Other Edit this page on GitHub .

item.title: Origin Point
item.description: Week 1: Yellow Lines. This art was lovingly created using: Processing (program) + Java. Artist’s Notes Circle created with Java code that randomizes the spiral variance and the stroke; I wanted to challenge myself to learn a new programming language this year since I enjoy using them for both work and side projects. I’d love to be able to do a different medium for each week if I’m able.

item.title: Objects
item.description: Week 1: Yellow Lines. This art was lovingly created using: Clip Studio Paint. Artist’s Notes i made this at 2 am. there is something special about this drawing. i really like all of these objects. i love ducks, bananas, stars, the sun, sunflowers, lemon, and cheese. i dont really like paprika tbh, but its yellow anyways :3 Social Media N/A. Other Edit this page on GitHub .

item.title: Profile
item.description: Week 1: Yellow Lines. This art was lovingly created using: Procreate Digital Painting. Artist’s Notes Basically a portrait of a model but using the Pantone colour of the year as the background. I thought the brightness of the yellow really stood out and so I ended up really appreciating the way it turned out! (Sorry hope I did this right lol) Social Media Instagram: paintsepsi Twitch: paintsepsi Twitter: paintsepsi Other Edit this page on GitHub .

item.title: Bowl
item.description: Week 1: Yellow Lines. This art was lovingly created using: MS Paint. Artist’s Notes simple geometry shape of a bowl highlighted using pre-programmed algorithm of MS Paint, the yellow used to demonstrate the 3 dimensionality of bowl… aaaa theres a cat in it …. oh welp if it fits, it sits ¬Ø_(„ÉÑ)_/¬Ø Social Media Instagram: jumpingbeansz Twitch: jumpingbeansz Other Edit this page on GitHub .
